page.title: 03CLUBS Organisations
page.content: {Red Cross} There are two Red Cross Junior groups in Burgess Hill, they both meet from 6.30 - 8pm. They wear uniforms of navy, white and red. Sessions include First Aid, nursing and outdoor safety. {Boys Brigade { }There is a large company in Burgess Hill. It has boys from 8 to 18 years old. The company section has a Championship class band. {Girls Brigade { }The Girls Brigade meet at the Methodist Church like the boys. Some of them are in the band. {Scouts There are several Scout and Cub groups in the town. They have their own headquarters in Station Road. {Guides { The Guides also have their own headquarters in Station Road.
